recommendations: 🔐 URGENT: Remove all hardcoded secrets immediately. Move them to environment variables and rotate all exposed credentials.
🛡️ Review and fix insecure code patterns. Use parameterized queries, avoid eval/exec, and validate all inputs.
🔒 Never use service_role keys in client code. Use anon key for client-side operations.
🔄 Implement regular security scanning in CI/CD pipeline
📊 Enable Dependabot for automated dependency updates
🎯 Add security headers to all HTTP responses
✅ Implement input validation on all API endpoints
🚦 Add rate limiting to prevent abuse
📋 Document security practices and incident response procedures
